content: {"Name": "Clifton Park Senior Community Center", "Entity_Id": 3787, "Category": "Community Meal/Soup Kitchen", "Subcategory": "Senior Meal Services", "Organization": "Saratoga County ", "More_Information": "Congregate meals are served at meal sites Monday \u2013 Friday to qualifying seniors throughout Saratoga County. All participants\r\nreceive a hot meal at 12 Noon. Diners must be 60 or older, and RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED. Reservations can be made either in\r\nperson or via telephone by noon the day prior.", "Counties": ["Saratoga"], "Location": "", "Address": "6 Clifton Commons Ct.", "City": "Clifton Park", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12065", "Phone": "518-383-1343", "Hours_of_Operation": "Monday-Friday at 12", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "https://www.saratogacountyny.gov/departments/department-of-aging-and-youth-services/senior-meal-programs/", "Coalition": 0, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.86134346732351", "Longitude": "-73.81803432061974", "Last_Updated": "04-18-2024", "icon": "marker-4FA03B", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
